section.title: Gridmap errors
section.para: The following are some common problems that may cause clients or servers to report that user are not authorized:

section.title: The content of the gridmap file does not conform to the expected format
section.para: Use grid-mapfile-check-consistency to make sure that your gridmap conforms to the expected format.

section.title: The gridmap file does not contain a entry for your DN
section.para: Use grid-mapfile-add-entry to add the relevant entry.
